body:
Comment 21: 
> Yes, bring it to the mailing list.  We're just repeating ourselves.
Will do.  After some fresh air :-)

> I don't see how you can have two different packages with a package path of "main". 
Can you show an example?
I didn't mean within the same build.  I meant two different package mains built as
separate commands (e.g., godoc and gofmt).
